## About

Prof. Katja Scheffler leads the Trønderbrain project at St. Olavs Hospital, focusing on next-generation translational medicine approaches in AD research. Her work bridges basic research and clinical applications.

## Research Interests

- Translational medicine
- Clinical biomarkers
- Brain organoids
- Treatment development
